/usr/bin/c++  -std=c++17 -g CMakeFiles/main.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/main.dir/src/utils.cpp.o CMakeFiles/main.dir/src/encoder.cpp.o CMakeFiles/main.dir/src/pushwork.cpp.o -o main   -L/usr/local/lib  -L/home/wanghf/ffmpeg_build/lib  -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib:/home/wanghf/ffmpeg_build/lib -lavformat -lavcodec -lavdevice -lavfilter -lswscale -lswresample -lavutil /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libSDL2.so -lopencv_core -lopencv_highgui -lopencv_imgproc -lopencv_imgcodecs -lbz2 -lasound -lz -lm -lpthread -ldl
